meanings.definition: A device used to support, align, prevent, or correct deformities or to improve the function of movable parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: The orthotic helped the boy walk better after his leg injury.
meanings.sent2: She got custom orthotics made for her flat feet.
meanings.sent3: The orthotic decided to take a break and relax on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an orthotic, providing support and comfort to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The orthotic was a superhero for the foot, saving it from pain and discomfort.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to orthotics or orthoses.
meanings.sent1: The orthotic specialist explained the benefits of using custom insoles.
meanings.sent2: He wore orthotic shoes to help with his posture.
meanings.sent3: The orthotic cat strutted confidently in its new orthopedic collar.
meanings.sent4: Her orthotic charm bracelet was a subtle nod to her profession.
meanings.sent5: The orthotic clinic had a calming, orthopedic scent that put patients at ease.
